Bevel Precision Pack. From smooth shaves to sharp lineups, this grooming bundle combines two best-sellers—the Bevel Foil Shaver and Trimmer SE—for a complete system that delivers barber-quality results at home or on-the-go.

USUALLY SHIPS IN 1 BUSINESS DAY

30 DAY MONEY-BACK GUARANTEE

What’s Inside:

  • Bevel Foil Shaver: Clean, close shaves with dermatologist-tested blades that adapt to your contours.

  • Bevel Trimmer SE: Precision trimmer with Square Blade for crisp line-ups and detailing.

Why You’ll Love It:

  • Smooth + Comfortable Shaves: 3 flexible blades and auto-sensing tech adjust for irritation-free results.

  • Sharp, Defined Lines: Tool-less blade adjustments let you fade, outline, and trim with pro-level control.

  • Versatile Grooming: Perfect for face, head, beard, or mustache—whether it’s daily shaving or detailed styling.

  • On-the-Go Ready: Sleek, lightweight design makes both tools easy to pack and travel with.

  • Complete System: Everything you need for barber-quality grooming in one bundle.

Complete Your Routine!
